familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former chairman/director and president of The Trump Marks Real Estate Corp., of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: The Trump Marks Real Estate Corp.

familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president/member of Trump Marks Real Estate LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, is not inactive nor dormant, and is not part of an entity structure or license deal.
